breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldDarkTeal(surprisingly humanoid)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly honey)].
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [##npc.getCovering(BODY_COVERING_TYPE_MILK).setPrimaryColour(COLOUR_COVERING_AMBER)] [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly-like)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldDarkTeal(dragonfly honey)].
